name: Water Your Melons
description:
A simple game about watering watermelons. Use arrow keys to move around. Collect watering cans and water the melons by walking on them. Moving around reveals more of the map. You will need to explore to find new watering cans, but exploring will also reveal more watermelons that need to be watered! Don't let any watermelons dry out!

Tools used: 

Unity3D, GIMP, Bitfontmaker2, Chiptone, and Jukedeck

Music from Jukedeck - create your own at http://jukedeck.com

This game was made for Ludum Dare 40.  It was my first entry in Ludum Dare!
